system.notes: The Armour of the Great Crusade, less an upgrade and more an alternate to the Mk II. Additional -20 to Concealment and Silent Move, +5 to prevent Cohesion Damage, +20 Fellowship with Space Marines. +25 Strength. utosenses (+5), Osmotic Sustainer, Pain Suppressant (8), Vox Link, Magnetised Boots, Nutrient Recycling (1 Week), Recoil Suppression. -20 Manual Dexterity Mod. Has 6 AP All if shot from the back. 20 minutes to don/doff unaided, 5 mins aided, Half action to remove helmet. Increases Size to Hulking.
